verbs.description: [ARG0: Anyone] [R-ARG0: who] [V: walks] [ARGM-DIR: past a newsstand] knows that Time magazine hates Donald Trump . In 2016 , they pictured his orange face melting on the cover , and then months later , that cover face melted into an orange puddle . They considered it unthinkable that he would win . Then once he won , two different covers imagined an endangered Trump in the middle of a raging storm .
